concept.title: DITA processing
concept.shortdesc: DITA processing is affected by a number of factors, including attributes that indicate the set of vocabulary and constraint modules on which a DITA document depends; navigation; linking; content reuse (using direct or indirect addressing); conditional processing; branch filtering; chunking; and more. In addition, translation of DITA content is expedited through the use of the dir, translate, and xml:lang attributes, and the index-sort-as element.
